Title: Requires car washes to disclose when promotions expire
Summary: Requires car washes to disclose when promotions expire as well as any costs which will be incurred upon the expiration of such promotion and how often such costs will be incurred upon someone taking part in such promotion.
LawCode: Add ยง399-eee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring car washes to disclose when promotions expire
